hero.subheadline: How we use cookies and how you can control your preferences.

sections.title: What Are Cookies?
sections.body: Cookies are small text files stored on your device to help websites function, improve performance, and personalize experiences.

sections.title: Types of Cookies We Use
items: Essential: Required for core functionality and security
Performance/Analytics: Understand usage to improve the site
Marketing: Measure campaign effectiveness (only with consent)

sections.title: Your Choices
items: Manage preferences via the cookie banner
Disable cookies in browser settings (may affect functionality)
Opt out of analytics/marketing where offered

sections.title: Third-Party Cookies
sections.body: Some cookies are set by third parties (e.g., analytics, embedded content). Their policies apply to their cookies.

sections.title: Retention
sections.body: Cookie lifetimes vary by type and purpose. Session cookies expire when you close the browser; persistent cookies last longer.

sections.title: Updates
sections.body: We may update this Cookie Policy. The 'Updated On' date reflects the latest version.
